thread.section_title: Reid Cycles Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reid Cycles | reidcycles.com.au
thread.title: Dilara Yilmaz
thread.title_full: Reid Cycles reviewed by Dilara Yilmaz

author: Dilara Yilmaz
title: Dilara Yilmaz
text: when i purchased from reid, i was told that my package would deliver the next business day, however, it took closer to 5 days for the item to be delivered, and despite not ticking the box for the package to be left at the front door without me signing for it, it was. although no harm was done to the package or item itself, this was a slight annoyance from my end. however, the items were gorgeous and perfectly suited and fit my bike, and this was more important than the slight hiccups in terms of delivery.
